meanings.sent1: She is forming a new club at school.
meanings.sent2: The artist is forming a beautiful sculpture out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The kids are forming a plan to surprise their teacher.
meanings.sent4: His words are forming a bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The chef is forming a perfect circle with the dough.

meanings.definition: To take shape or come into existence
meanings.sent1: The storm clouds are forming in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The friendship between them is forming slowly.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a flying car is forming in his mind.
meanings.sent4: The team spirit is forming among the players.
meanings.sent5: The plan is forming step by step in her head.

meanings.definition: The process of shaping or molding something
meanings.sent1: The forming of the clay pot requires patience.
meanings.sent2: The forming of the new policy took weeks of discussion.
meanings.sent3: The forming of the cake batter was messy but fun.
meanings.sent4: The forming of the team's strategy was crucial for the game.
meanings.sent5: The forming of the clouds in the sky was a sight to behold.
